Description: Job Title:Cleaning and Landscaping InspectorJob Description:Responsible for ensuring that Sales offices and public spaces are well-maintained and meet cleanliness and landscaping standards. This role involves conducting inspections, assessing the quality of cleaning, and landscaping activities, identifying deficiencies, and working with maintenance teams to ensure corrective actions are taken. The inspector plays a crucial role in upholding the aesthetic and functional aspects of various environments of Sales Office.Key ResponsibilitiesInspection and Evaluation:Conduct thorough inspections of office facilities, both indoor and outdoor spaces, to assess the quality of cleaning and landscaping activities.Evaluate the overall cleanliness, hygiene, and appearance of spaces, as well as the condition of landscapes, gardens, and outdoor amenities.Identify deviations from established cleaning and landscaping standards and regulationsDocument inspection findings using detailed reports, photographs, and notes.Maintain accurate records of inspection results and follow-up actions taken by appointed maintenance contractors and employer.Communication:Communicate inspection findings to FM department head, FM managers, and maintenance personnel.Provide clear feedback and recommendations for improvement based on identified deficiencies.Quality Assurance:Ensure that cleaning processes and landscaping practices align with industry standards and guidelines.Verify that cleaning products, tools, and equipment are used effectively, safely and in accordance with standards and certifications.Compliance:Monitor compliance with relevant regulations, environmental guidelines, and safety protocols in both cleaning and landscaping activities.Ensure that the proper disposal of waste and hazardous materials is carried out in accordance with applicable regulations.Training and Guidance:Offer guidance and training to cleaning and landscaping staff regarding best practices, techniques, and safety measures.Provide recommendations for continuous improvement in cleaning and landscaping procedures.Problem Solving:Identify root causes of recurring cleaning or landscaping issues and collaborate with teams to implement solutions.Address and resolve any complaints or concerns related to cleaning and landscaping quality.Report GenerationGenerate regular and ad-hoc reports summarizing inspection findings, trends, and improvement actions.Present reports to management or relevant stakeholders as needed.Qualifications and Requirements:Bachelors diploma or equivalent; relevant certifications or coursework in cleaning, landscaping, or related fields is an advantage.Proven experience in cleaning, landscaping, maintenance, or related roles.Strong attention to detail and observational skills.Knowledge of cleaning techniques, landscaping practices, and industry standards.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment.Familiarity with relevant regulations and safety protocols.Proficiency in using digital tools for documentation and reporting.Physical ability to conduct on-site inspections, including walking, standing, and bending.Job Details
